Reviews.Title: “Average with very good breakfast”
Reviews.Author: Beyond_all_Borders
Reviews.Content: stayed night traveling europe location bit outside berlin didnt mind seeing outer city train station 10 minutes walk theres plenty grocery markets restaurants shops service average breakfast buffet excellent spread hot cold wish id stay price city convenience wasnt deal breaker

Reviews.Title: “Feedback following vist”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 4 days november 2011 location excellent situated quiet street main kurfurstendam easy reach tourist attractions sights historical transportation including 109 bus tegal airport rates comparable hotels staff courteous extremely helpful recommend hotel berlin tourist

Reviews.Title: “A Great, perfectly located, little Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Tri_man_UK
Reviews.Content: location location location stay main street close nice restaurants zoo etc hotel compact adequate standard breakfast main reason makes hotel stand location unbelieveable staff reception staff breakfast waiting staff smiley incredibly helpful mention spent hours trying track lost luggage smile stay time am berlin question

Reviews.Title: “rubbish hotel”
Reviews.Author: NatashaClaire1980
Reviews.Content: jaded car park bins emptied 630am wooden windows flithy againnot 4 standard holiday disappointed foodand cleanstaff excellent friendly helpful

Reviews.Title: “Old worn down and charged 150% of actual price!”
Reviews.Author: wicketo
Reviews.Content: found deal internet including breakfast booked night colleages six total hotel shabby looking outside similarly worn bathrooms ok beds service breakfast alright definately 4 star main criticism happened time booking found rate prepaid quickly realized hotel charged credit card 150 amount reservation confirmation call times course week called promissed issue resolved excess amount wired credit card real apology forward poor service main reason absolutely recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Basic, shabby, Poor, overpriced,”
Reviews.Author: Mewife2kids
Reviews.Content: bad hotel usual holiday inn standards basic shower views etc refurb looking tired stayed 4 star hotel berlin worst stayed ok booked short notice hotels money worth shopping etc wifi stopped peak times business traveller 6 euros cab main train station

Reviews.Title: “Attention! They have expensive internet”
Reviews.Author: enricarchivell
Reviews.Content: information hotel suggests free internet included price charge ammount money 5 € half hour 12 5 € service free hotes berlin president similar category account internet

Reviews.Title: “DO NOT BOOK THIS HOTEL!!!”

Reviews.Content: hotel recommended english speaking staff info office berlin main train station extremelly disappointed arrived barely managed fit suit lift reception bar laughable yes clean carpets stained appearance run major revamp staff friendly helpful breckfast location overall terrible hotel definately reccomend facing street loud saturday night sleep noise
